title: Frog went a-courtin'
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios and Morton Schindel
brief_description: The story of Mr. Frog and Miss Mousie, made from the illustrations of Feodor Rojankovsky, and sung by John Langstaff. The story is told twice, the second time the words are superimposed on the screen facilitating audience (children) participation.
